title: Bedtime Storymaker
description: A simple app that generates bedtime stories like you're a kid again.

title: Movie Mashup
description: A simple app that generates a mashup of two movies. It's a fun way to see how different movies can be combined.

title: Play Me A Song
description: Search and if we find it, it'll open the song in Spotify!.

title: Factory Records Cassette Colors
description: A list of the colors of the cassette releases from Factory Records.
